Title: Chapter 49
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Melissa James Gibson, Kenneth Lin, Laura Eason (executive story editor), Bill Kennedy (executive story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Derek Cecil
Plot: As Frank deals with a new threat to his candidacy, Claire has doubts about their plan. Claire faces a difficult decision concerning her mother's health.
